attributes.action: Goverment to reverse quarantine on the Balearic islands and Canary islands
attributes.additional_details: Because they are not following scientific advise and not thinking about the safety of the nation such us doing local lockdown. Places such as the canary and balearic islands are safer than some cities in the uk
attributes.background: The goverment needs to follow on scientific facts in regards to the decision on having to quarantine for 2 weeks upon arrival from the Balearic and Canary islands
